#summary JAXB support

= Introduction =
*Please note*:
JAXB support is currently under development. Therefore this page describe the current status rather than the finished documentation.   

= Supported annotations =
== Class ==
  * `@XmlRootElement`
  * `@XmlType`
  * `@XmlAccessorOrder`
  * `@XmlAccessorType`

== Enum ==
  * `@XmlEnum`
  * `@XmlEnumValue`
  * `@XmlRootElement`
  * `@XmlType`

== Property / Field == 
  * `@XmlElements`
  * `@XmlElement`
  * `@XmlElementWrapper`
  * `@XmlElementRefs`
  * `@XmlElementRef`
  * `@XmlList`
  * `@XmlAttribute`
  * `@XmlValue`
  * `@XmlTransient`
  * `@XmlID`
  * `@XmlIDREF`
